trans-unit.source: . That means that you can import it in any Python file you want, and use it in the context of an incoming HTTP request. If you’ve split your Flask app up into multiple different files, feel free to import this object in any of your files, and use it just like you would use the
trans-unit.target: 。这意味着您可以将其导入所需的任何Python文件中，并在传入的HTTP请求的上下文中使用它。如果您已将Flask应用程序拆分成多个不同的文件，则可以随时在任何文件中导入该对象，并像使用

trans-unit.source: By default, OAuth access tokens are stored in Flask’s session object. This means that if the user ever clears their browser cookies, they will have to go through the OAuth dance again, which is not good. You’re better off storing access tokens in a database or some other persistent store, and Flask-Dance has support for swapping out the token storage. For example, if you’re using SQLAlchemy, set it up like this:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，OAuth访问令牌存储在Flask的会话对象中。这意味着，如果用户清除了浏览器Cookie，则将不得不再次进行OAuth舞蹈，这不好。您最好将访问令牌存储在数据库或其他持久性存储中，并且Flask-Dance支持交换令牌存储。例如，如果您使用的是SQLAlchemy，则将其设置如下：

trans-unit.source: Doing the OAuth dance with style using Flask, requests, and oauthlib
trans-unit.target: 使用Flask、request和oauthlib,有模有样地跳OAuth舞。

trans-unit.source: Doing the OAuth dance with style using Flask, requests, and oauthlib. Currently, only OAuth consumers are supported, but this project could easily support OAuth providers in the future, as well. The full documentation for this project is hosted on ReadTheDocs, including the full list of supported OAuth providers, but this README will give you a taste of the features.
trans-unit.target: 使用Flask，请求和oauthlib在风格上进行OAuth跳舞。当前，仅支持OAuth使用者，但是此项目将来也可以轻松支持OAuth提供者。该项目的完整文档位于ReadTheDocs上，包括受支持的OAuth提供程序的完整列表，但是此README将带您领略这些功能。

trans-unit.target: 瓶子舞

trans-unit.source: Full Documentation
trans-unit.target: 完整文档

trans-unit.source: The SQLAlchemy storage seamlessly integrates with Flask-SQLAlchemy, as well as Flask-Login for user management, and Flask-Caching for caching.
trans-unit.target: SQLAlchemy存储与Flask-SQLAlchemy以及Flask-Login（用于用户管理）和Flask-Caching（用于缓存）无缝集成。

trans-unit.source: This README provides just a taste of what Flask-Dance is capable of. To see more, read the documentation on ReadTheDocs.
trans-unit.target: 该自述文件仅介绍了Flask-Dance的功能。要了解更多信息，请 阅读ReadTheDocs上的文档。

trans-unit.source: You can also use Flask-Dance with any OAuth provider you’d like, not just the pre-set configurations. See the documentation for how to use other OAuth providers.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以将Flask-Dance与所需的任何OAuth提供程序一起使用，而不仅仅是预设的配置。请参阅文档，了解如何使用其他OAuth提供程序。
